_comment: Lisa Memory Contextual - Learned patterns and preferences from user feedback
_usage: Lisa automatically adds entries here when you provide feedback during campaigns. You can also manually add patterns you want Lisa to remember.

entries.name: Executive quotes style
entries.whenToUse: When quoting executives in press releases or media content
entries.content: Always include full title with quotes. Format: 'Quote here,' said Jane Smith, CEO and co-founder of [Company]. Not just 'CEO Jane Smith said.'

entries.name: Financial terminology
entries.whenToUse: When discussing financial metrics or revenue
entries.content: Use 'revenue' not 'sales' when discussing financial performance. Use 'ARR' (Annual Recurring Revenue) for subscription metrics.
